extra.title: A beautiful young woman, Lin Ruoqiu, with snow-white porcelain skin, ice-blue eyes, and long silver hair cascading down to her waist, sits by the window of a sunlit tram. She is wearing a modified school uniform: an extremely short, navel-baring top that barely covers the underside of her breasts, and a micro-skirt that resembles panties. Her legs are adorned with white thigh-high stockings. She is gently touching her arm with her fingers, a subtle expression of surprise and curiosity on her face as she experiences the effects of a new rule. The sunlight streams through the window, highlighting the fine hairs on her skin and the delicate fabric of her altered uniform. The tram interior is bright, with other passengers blurred in the background, their clothing also reflecting the new, revealing world rules. Focus on her ethereal beauty and the sensual tension of her self-discovery in this Xianxia-fantasy setting. Her hands are gracefully at her sides or on her lap.
